title: What’s Going On in This Picture? | Nov. 7, 2022
description: Look closely at this image, stripped of its caption, and join the moderated conversation about what you and other students see.
dc:creator: The Learning Network

media:content.media:credit: Roger Kisby for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: What’s going on in this picture? Look closely at the image above or view it in a larger size, then tell us what you see by posting a comment. On Thursday afternoon, we will reveal more about the image and its origins at the bottom of this post.
